title: Managing Your Account
content:
# Managing Your Account

## Updating Profile Information

### Change Name
1. Go to Account Settings
2. Click "Edit Profile"
3. Update name
4. Click "Save"

### Change Email
1. Account Settings > Email
2. Enter new email
3. Verify via email link
4. Confirm change

### Update Phone
1. Account Settings > Phone
2. Enter new number
3. Verify via SMS code

### Profile Picture
- Click current picture
- Upload new (JPG, PNG)
- Max size: 5MB
- Recommended: 400x400px

## Managing Addresses

### Add Address
1. Account > Addresses
2. Click "Add Address"
3. Fill in details
4. Mark as default (optional)
5. Save

### Edit Address
- Click pencil icon
- Update fields
- Save changes

### Delete Address
- Click trash icon
- Confirm deletion
- (Cannot delete default)

### Set Default
- Click "Make Default"
- Used for quick checkout

## Communication Preferences

### Email Settings
- Order updates: Always on
- Marketing: Optional
- Recommendations: Optional
- Newsletter: Optional

### SMS Notifications
- Shipping updates
- Delivery notifications
- Account alerts

### Push Notifications
- Mobile app only
- Order status
- Special offers

## Privacy Settings

### Data Sharing
- Control profile visibility
- Manage cookie preferences
- Marketing opt-out

### Download Your Data
1. Privacy Settings
2. "Download My Data"
3. Receive link via email
4. Valid for 48 hours

### Delete Account
1. Account Settings > Privacy
2. "Delete Account"
3. Enter password
4. Confirm deletion
5. 30-day grace period

## Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Can I have multiple email addresses?
A: No, one email per account.

Q: How do I merge accounts?
A: Contact customer support.
